name: Dört Model Müzesi
description:
Four Model Museum, which focuses on the narration of the subjects named 4 Models within the scope of the experimental public relations education developed with the collaboration of Istanbul Aydın University New Media Application and Research Center to be used in public relations education, with virtual reality technology; With its virtual reality headset and controllers, it allows you to take the user on a historical journey and provide a cultural museum visit.

With the Four Model Museum;

The narration of the subjects named four models within the body of public relations, by historical characters in a museum; It is also supported visually and aurally. In addition to this, the animations of historical moments and events that have taken place in the subjects named four models allow the user to experience them through virtual reality and provide impressive educational results.
